eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.dynamicmodels

Class DynamicModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.dynamicmodels.DynamicModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoRegressiveHMM, CustomKalmanFilter, DynamicClassifier, FactorialHMM, HiddenMarkovModel, InputOutputHMM, KalmanFilter, SwitchingKalmanFilter

    public abstract class DynamicModel
extends Object
    The DynamicModel abstract class is defined as a superclass to all dynamic standard models (not used for classification, if so, extends DynamicClassifier) Created by andresmasegosa, ana@cs.aau.dk on 04/03/16.
